I 100% recommend this game i have been playing this since it came out for the Xbox 360 and have enjoyed it and its second game Left 4 Dead 2 and have spent hours into the game just losing track of time and enjoying every moment.

打折入手，一代体验情怀和对比二代的部分枪械手感的话还是不错的（个人感觉连喷霰弹枪和手枪的手感一代要比二代好）
一代虽然没有近战武器，但可以无限推（所以这就是我不愿意在一代见到胖子的原因），部分地图相对二代略微改动。
特感就有点少了（没有口水，牛，猴子），特感的威胁相对于二代来说简单了一。
此外一代独有的生还者可以看见自己身体的视角（二代把这个取消了，感觉挺可惜的）
AI的智商比二代要低，你倒地了AI快把你给救起来了,结果直接给我放手了，血压拉满233
如果你想在二代和一代之间只选一个游戏的话，我建议直接去买二代，因为二代里面就有一代的图，而且二代的内容比一代要多，在线人数也是一代的10倍左右，最最最重要的是，二代有创意工坊，而一代没有。
总的来说求生之路系列非常不错，G胖你什么数三啊（滑稽）

[h1]Left 4 Dead: Zombie Survival Co-op at its Finest[/h1]
[b]Introduction to Left 4 Dead[/b]
Left 4 Dead is a co-op zombie fps that pits 4 survivors against a massive horde of zombies as they try to survive each campaign. The survivors consist of 4 unforgettable characters with amazing chemistry and personalities. These 4 are: The man who hates everything: Francis, Vietnam Veteran Bill, Overly-Positive Louis, and College Girl Zoey.
The survivors must get to a safe room at the end of the first four levels and make a last stand in the fifth level's finale. This is the main setup for the campaigns: No Mercy, Death Toll, Dead Air, and Blood Harvest. There are also two additional, shorter campaigns: Crash Course (Has only 2 levels) and The Sacrifice (Contains 3 levels). Each campaign is short, sweet, and never overstays its welcome.

[b]Left 4 Dead's Other Modes[/b]
Besides the campaigns, Left 4 Dead also features Versus and Survival modes. 
Versus mode has one team as the survivors and another team as one of four special infected (Hunter, Boomer, Smoker, and Tank on certain occasions). The maps in versus are the same as the ones found in the campaigns. Once a match is over, the roles are switched and the level plays again. After all of the levels have been finished by both teams, whichever team scored the highest wins.
In Survival, the 4 survivors must last as long as they can until all of them are killed by the horde. A couple maps in this mode are from the campaigns, but there is a map exclusive to Survival called The Last Stand, which has its own unique setting.

[b]Singleplayer and Multiplayer Options[/b]
Campaign and Survival can be played solo, but the AI in Left 4 Dead varies. Sometimes they can be very useful and offer the player pills or heal them with a first aid kit, but other times they'll be too far away from the player to save them from the special infected. The AI also can't pick up throwables such as Molotovs and Pipebombs. Though I wouldn't quite suggest playing with randoms for Campaign and Survival as they aren't exactly the most reliable of teammates, but on odd occasion honest, good players can be found. Versus is a multiplayer only endeavor, and is best experienced with 8 people, but 1-player teams can be arranged.

[b]Rating: Buy 1 Today[/b]
This game gets an 8/10 from me. Left 4 Dead is a one of a kind experience in the zombie genre of video games. With over 20 campaign levels to complete and addicting co-op gameplay that's fun to come back to, Left 4 Dead is the best of its kind with an even greater sequel.
